name: dark$
tagline: interactive web application illustrating rapid expansion in “dark money” funding, a trend that has grown ~1000% since 2012 in the United States Congress.
body:
# **dark$**
_### By Chris Bradshaw, Linda Haviv & Matteo Ziff

**Production version: ** [darkmoney.io](http://www.darkmoney.io) - note please allot up to 30 seconds on initial load for Heroku to boot.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
